snippet.title: Pentacore - A Retro Inspired Metroidvania.
snippet.description:
#shorts #gaming #metroidvania 
Pentacore is a metroidvania with a focus on platforming and exploration. Run, shoot, climb, and blast your way through a massive world. All in order to find five keys and leave your prison of a planet. 

Available on Nintendo Switch
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2074600/Pentacore/
